Package myGame

Class Castle

java.lang.Object
myGame.Castle
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Castle
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
A castle is an object in the game Duke of the Realm It has a owner, some properties such as its treasury, level, position...

2019-12-23

  • Method Details

    • costToLevel

      public int costToLevel()
      Returns the cost to level up the castle.
      Returns:
      the cost to level up the castle

    • timeToLevel

      public int timeToLevel()
      Returns the number of ticks to level up.
      Returns:
      the number of ticks to level up

    • levelUp

      public void levelUp()
      Add a new "level up" production if the castle has enough money.

    • tick

      public void tick()
      Adds due income to the castle, propagate the tick to the production units, if a production if finished, remove it from the production line, dispatches units, remove empty orders.

    • addTroop

      public void addTroop​(Troop troop)
      Adds a troop to the castle's troops. When a troop is added, its health is replenished.
      Parameters:
      troop - the troop that should be added

    • addTroops

      public void addTroops​(java.util.List<Troop> troops)
      Adds a list of troops to the castle's troops. When a troop is added, its health is replenished.
      Parameters:
      troops - the troops that should be added

    • addProduction

      public void addProduction​(java.lang.Class<?> c)
      Adds a troop to the production line. Remove its cost from the castle treasury.
      Parameters:
      c - the troop class

    • addOrder

      public void addOrder​(Castle target, java.util.List<Troop> troops)
      Add a new order to the castle.
      Parameters:
      target - the castle the troops should move towards
      troops - the troops concerned by the order

    • cancelProduction

      public void cancelProduction()
      Removes the first added element in production, meaning the oldest one.

    • cancelAllProduction

      public void cancelAllProduction()
      Removes all productions.

    • takesDamage

      public void takesDamage​(int damage)
      The castle's troops takes a certain amount of damage. If a troop's health gets to 0, he is removed from troops.
      Parameters:
      damage - how much damage

    • dealDamage

      public int dealDamage()
      Calculates how much damage the castle can deal.
      Returns:
      how much damage the castle can deal

    • drawSelf

      public void drawSelf()
      Draw the castle and its door on the panel.

    • drawTroop

      public void drawTroop​(Troop troop)
      Create the troop shape. The shape is set to not visible.
      Parameters:
      troop - the troop to be drawn.

    • undrawTroop

      public void undrawTroop​(Troop troop)
      Remove the troop shape from the game's pane.
      Parameters:
      troop - the troop which shape will be removed.

      public Point getLocation()
